//Number of odd and even numbers
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
int main()
{
    int n,i;
    long long int se=0,sf=0,x;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&x);
        if(x%2==0)
            se++;
        else sf++;
    }
    if(se>sf)
        printf("%lld",se-sf);
    else
        printf("%lld",sf-se);
    return 0;
}
